title: LLM Utilization Strategies for Data Science Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational machine learning concepts, no programming experience
context.additional_context: Learning practical applications of LLMs for solving real-world data science problems, structured with hands-on activities accessible via smartphone-based environments.

learning_goals: Cultivation of the ability to generate code and design solutions for diverse data science problems using Large Language Models (LLMs).
Acquisition of the ability to comparatively analyze the effectiveness of Few-shot Prompting (FSP) and Tree of Thought (ToT) strategies.
Understanding and application of methods to optimize LLM performance through hyperparameter tuning (HPT).
Development of the ability to evaluate solutions by comparing LLM-generated results with AutoML framework outcomes.

resources: Online LLM Platforms (Colab, Hugging Face, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
